T02TD1480E:123a-1: tattva garbha n'a ma s'a dha n'am /
T02TD1480E:123a-3: de kho na'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba /
T02TD1480E:123a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1480E:123a-5: phyogs ro cha gcig snang ba'i byang chub zla ba rdo rje nor bu'i mthar 'dzin cing //
T02TD1480E:123a-6: phyogs zhal dga' ba rnam dag nyi zla'i spyan dang nyi ma'i phyag mnga' nam mkha' 'dra //
T02TD1480E:123b-0: rgyu ma'i mgo dang rgyu gdul blang chen lpags ni rked mthar @123b phyin pa btsun mor bcas //
T02TD1480E:123b-1: mchog dang bral ba'i zhabs ni g-yas brkyang gnyis sbyor khro bo'i tshul la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1480E:123b-2: rang byung bde ba rtogs pa las //
T02TD1480E:123b-3: 'byung ba mang po nyams myong zhing //
T02TD1480E:123b-4: rigs kyi phyag rgya'i spyod pa ni //
T02TD1480E:123b-5: bde ba dang 'brel yongs dag blo //
T02TD1480E:123b-6: dbugs ldan dur khrod gnas su ni //
T02TD1480E:123b-7: brtse ba gzhan gyis dbang byas te //
T02TD1480E:123b-8: dmar la sogs pa'i ri lu lnga //
T02TD1480E:123b-9: khar bcu gnas ni smon lam gdon //
T02TD1480E:123b-10: sems can don phyir byed pa che //
T02TD1480E:123b-11: he ru ka ra bdag dran par shog / ye shes gcig bdag mnyam bzhag pas//
T02TD1480E:123b-12: bla ma la sogs mchod par bya //
T02TD1480E:123b-13: gnod mdzes sngags spros lha mo yi //
T02TD1480E:123b-14: khro mo khva gdong sogs brgyad kyis //
T02TD1480E:123b-15: bgegs gtor nas ni mi thod du //
T02TD1480E:123b-16: dron mo'i khrag ni gsol bar mdzad //
T02TD1480E:123b-17: tshangs sogs lha dang mi'am ci //
T02TD1480E:123b-18: mkha' las rgyal bar gyur pa dag / sa gzhi 'bar ba'i mes bsregs te //
T02TD1480E:123b-19: thal bar gyur nas dengs par 'gyur //
T02TD1480E:123b-20: mgo rdum gar byed dum sgong can //
T02TD1480E:123b-21: mi bzad ha ha'i sgras 'khrugs shig / ro bsreg dud pa 'khyil pa dang //
T02TD1480E:123b-22: phat sgra'i dbugs kyis khyab gyur pa //
T02TD1480E:123b-23: myos bcas dag pa'i gzugs kyis ni //
T02TD1480E:123b-24: sgyu 'phrul rgyu phreng gis brgyan pa //
T02TD1480E:123b-25: h'um spros rdo rje dra ba yi //
T02TD1480E:123b-26: nang gi rang gi sa bon gyi //
T02TD1480E:123b-27: 'od zer spros pas sa yi steng //
T02TD1480E:123b-28: ma lus sbyang ba byas pa yis //
T02TD1480E:123b-29: phung po'i sgrib pa kun rtog ni //
T02TD1480E:123b-30: log par shes 'dra rang nyid kyi //
T02TD1480E:123b-31: rnam pa lhag ma blo yis lta //
T02TD1480E:123b-32: mig yor bdag nyid dga' ba yis //
T02TD1480E:123b-33: sgra tsam las ni nges 'byung ba'i //
T02TD1480E:123b-34: chos dbyings nang du chud de bzhin //
T02TD1480E:123b-35: dang por rlung sogs 'gyur ba'i mthar //
T02TD1480E:123b-36: ri bo che stengs padma las //
T02TD1480E:123b-37: yig gsum las mtha' 'khor lo gsum //
T02TD1480E:123b-39: ma rig sgo nga'i sbubs 'joms pa'i //
T02TD1480E:123b-40: chem chem 'jigs su rung ba yi //
T02TD1480E:123b-41: sgra yi khams gsum 'khrug pa ni //
T02TD1480E:123b-43: mtshan mo 'jigs byed sgo nga'i cha //
T02TD1480E:123b-44: gnyis la g-yas brkyang zhabs kyis bzhugs //
T02TD1480E:124a-2: zhal drug chu bo las rgyal ba //
T02TD1480E:124a-3: yan lag bcu gnyis mthar phyin 'chad //
T02TD1480E:124a-4: gzugs dang sa yi phyag gis mtshan //
T02TD1480E:124a-5: sbyin pa la sogs mthar phyin phyir //
T02TD1480E:124a-6: sku chen phyag rgya drug dang ldan //
T02TD1480E:124a-7: mi yi phreng ba'i dbang po dang //
T02TD1480E:124a-8: khams gsum tha dang med pa nyid //
T02TD1480E:124a-9: gnas ngan len sogs ma rung sa dag / bcom phyir stag lpags na bza' bsnams //
T02TD1480E:124a-10: zhal sprad chos kyi phyag rgya ste //
T02TD1480E:124a-11: las kyi nang du skul mdzad cing //
T02TD1480E:124a-12: dam tshig skad cig phag mo dang //
T02TD1480E:124a-13: 'khyud pas phyag rgya chen por ldan //
T02TD1480E:124a-14: ye shes chen po sdom mdzad pas //
T02TD1480E:124a-15: ral pa zla bas mtshan pa 'chang //
T02TD1480E:124a-16: la la n'a sogs kyis brgyan pa //
T02TD1480E:124a-18: mthar bcom nam mkha' lding dang ni //
T02TD1480E:124a-19: thod pa yi ni thod kyis mtshan //
T02TD1480E:124a-20: rgyu 'bras mnyam par sbyor bas na //
T02TD1480E:124a-21: dbus ma rigs lnga'i bdag nyid can //
T02TD1480E:124a-22: byang chub phyogs dang bdud rtsi'i khams //
T02TD1480E:124a-23: gsang ba'i gnas kyi spyod yul nyid //
T02TD1480E:124a-24: mngon shes go cha dam pa yis //
T02TD1480E:124a-25: snying sogs yan lag rnam drug mtshan //
T02TD1480E:124a-26: rtse gsum gri gug dgra sta sogs //
T02TD1480E:124a-27: thod pa kha tv'am zhags pa dang //
T02TD1480E:124a-28: tshangs mgo rdor dril glang po yi //
T02TD1480E:124a-29: lpags bsnams nam mkha' dang 'dra ni //
T02TD1480E:124a-30: tshim dang chad dang 'jigs pa dang //
T02TD1480E:124a-31: sad dang ye shes bzhi 'dzin phyir //
T02TD1480E:124a-32: bdud bzhi po ni bkug pa yi //
T02TD1480E:124a-33: dag pa'i phyag ni rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1480E:124a-34: rnam pa kun du rgya che ba //
T02TD1480E:124a-35: spro dang bsdu bar mdzad pa'o//
T02TD1480E:124a-36: zhi gnas rnam par rtog med bdag / dag pa'i blo ni gcig par 'grub //
T02TD1480E:124a-37: phung po la sogs byin rlabs pa //
T02TD1480E:124a-38: sems rgyud dgod pa'i rgyur 'gyur bas //
T02TD1480E:124a-39: rnam rtog gzugs brnyan yin pa'i phyir //
T02TD1480E:124a-40: bya min rnal 'byor mthar son pas //
T02TD1480E:124a-41: yi ge nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis //
T02TD1480E:124a-42: mgo sogs gnas rnams dgod bya zhing //
T02TD1480E:124a-43: go cha chen po dang ldan pas //
T02TD1480E:124a-44: ye shes phyag rgya rab tu bstan //
T02TD1480E:124a-45: ye shes sku lus spyi tshugs su //
T02TD1480E:124a-47: zhu ba'i ye shes bdud rtsir ro //
T02TD1480E:124a-48: he ru ka yi rnam pa ni //
T02TD1480E:124b-0: @124b bcas pa'i khams gsum 'di khyab pa //
T02TD1480E:124b-1: shin tu bsil ba steng gi sgo //
T02TD1480E:124b-2: dz'a landha ra nas gzhug bya //
T02TD1480E:124b-3: gnas su rgyu ba'i sbyor bas ni //
T02TD1480E:124b-4: thim dang longs spyod dbang byas pa'i //
T02TD1480E:124b-5: rim gyis zla ba mthar rgyas shing //
T02TD1480E:124b-6: rang bzhin dri ma med pa'i lus //
T02TD1480E:124b-7: nges rgyas g-yo ba med pa dang //
T02TD1480E:124b-8: gnyis med gnyis su med pa dang //
T02TD1480E:124b-9: lhan cig skyes dga' dam pa'i dngos //
T02TD1480E:124b-10: dngos dang dngos med spyod dang bral //
T02TD1480E:124b-11: sbrul pa chos dang longs spyod dang //
T02TD1480E:124b-12: bde chen 'khor lo rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1480E:124b-13: aa ham ka ras bskyed pa yi //
T02TD1480E:124b-14: ye shes srad bus rab brgyus shing //
T02TD1480E:124b-15: sprul pa'i lus las yang dag 'byung //
T02TD1480E:124b-16: dag pa'i shel ltar dri med cing //
T02TD1480E:124b-17: sngags phreng brjod med skad cig dang //
T02TD1480E:124b-18: ldan pa'i sbyor ba bzlas brjod bya //
T02TD1480E:124b-20: skad cig 'jig rten gsum sreg byed //
T02TD1480E:124b-21: mi shigs yi ge'i sgo nas ni //
T02TD1480E:124b-22: bsil byed zhu ba g-yos 'gyur ba //
T02TD1480E:124b-23: lan stong bdud rtsi'i rgyun sum cu //
T02TD1480E:124b-24: rtsa gnyis yan lag spros pa che //
T02TD1480E:124b-25: ma yi mtha' ma'i mthar thug bzhi //
T02TD1480E:124b-26: gang ba rgyun chen 'gyur ba med //
T02TD1480E:124b-28: bde chen nam mkha' khyab par byed //
T02TD1480E:124b-29: skra grol mthon por rab 'dug cing //
T02TD1480E:124b-30: gcer bur gnas pa'i sgrub pa mchog / lus ni lho ru mngon phyogs te //
T02TD1480E:124b-31: yi ge phat sgrogs rkang pa ni //
T02TD1480E:124b-32: mnan cing gyen du blta ba nas //
T02TD1480E:124b-33: nam phyed gtor ma gtang bar bya //
T02TD1480E:124b-34: sum cu rtsa drug rnam rig can //
T02TD1480E:124b-35: ting 'dzin stobs kyis dag bya'i phyir //
T02TD1480E:124b-36: skad cig ma yis rnal 'byor bdag / gnyis po thams cad rnam par spangs //
T02TD1480E:124b-37: cho ga'i rnam pa 'di yis ni //
T02TD1480E:124b-38: myur du dngos grub 'thob byed cing //
T02TD1480E:124b-39: rdo rje byang chub myur 'di byas //
T02TD1480E:124b-40: kun mkhyen ye shes snying po dang khams blo chen 'jam dpal dang 'dra mkhas pa rnams //
T02TD1480E:124b-41: mi shes rtsa ba las byung rmongs pas mi mthun byas pa gang yin de bzod mdzod //
T02TD1480E:124b-42: rdo rje mkha' rgyu 'byung ba ma lus 'bar mdzad cing //
T02TD1480E:125a-1: pa'i me tog rgyas mdzad pa //
T02TD1480E:125a-2: nyi ma lta bur gzi brjid dang ldan bram ze mchog / dpal ldan bla ma shar pa'i dam tshig drin gyis bsdebs //
T02TD1480E:125a-3: 'di las bdag gis dge ba ni //
T02TD1480E:125a-4: dri med bsags sgrub ster byed pa //
T02TD1480E:125a-6: rdzogs pa'i byang chub mthar bgrod shog / de kho na'i snying bo zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD1480E:125a-7: slob dpon dad byed go chas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1480E:125a-9: // / kha che'i mkhan po bi n'a ya ka dang /
T02TD1480E:125a-10: lo ts'a ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o //
